incident_updates.body: Start time : 22/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing a preventive maintenance on the UPS of room G128A.

Start time : 22/08/2022 06:10 UTC End time : 26/08/2022 09:50 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The purpose of the operation is to add the panels coordinating the choke on the G317-318-319 cabinets and remove the panels from the G312 - 313 cabinets.

Start time : 22/08/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 01/09/2022 19:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will update our electrical infrastructure.
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:30UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : This maintenance consists of checking the operating condition of the generators.

Start time : 24/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 24/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : There will be a power delivery source switch to battery for 1 minute of time. Service improvement : The main objective of this maintenance is to test UPS batteries.
Start time : 24/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 25/08/2022 14:30UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : This maintenance consists of checking the operating condition of the generators.

Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
